features: ❥【UPGRADE AIR VOLUME - INCREASE 70%】 Upgrade neck fan use innovative turbo fan blades and wind hole design, increase 70% air volume, make you cool down quickly in 3 seconds.
❥【4000mAh HIGH CAPACITY BATTERY & 4-16 RUNNING HRS】 Built-in 4000mAh battery provides UP to16 hours of operating time. The portable fan need only 4 hours to be fully charged.

❥【ULTRA QUIET & BLADELESS SAFE】 The USB fan for neck adopts latest noise reduction technology, utral quiet. Bladeless neck fan can be used safely by children & the elderly. Do not worry about your hair getting caught.

❥【3 ADJUSTABLE SPEEDS & FREE YOUR HANDS】 You can press the power button to adjust the proper fan speed of the neckfan to meet your needs. Personal fan was designed as a headphone to free your hands; The fashion style makes you look cool in the crowd. Wearable neck fan is lightweight, easy to carry.

❥【PRACTICAL & NO-WORRY SHOPPING】 Rechargeable neck fan for men is ideal for office indoor outdoor work, gym, walking, driving, traveling, camping, etc. If you have any problems with our cooling neck fan, please feel free to contact us.

Can the neck fan’s wind speed be adjusted? Yes, KIDEE portable fan offers 3 adjustable wind speeds to meet your different needs. How long can the battery last with a full charge ? KIDEE personal fan is equipped with 4000mAh battery and requires approximately 4 hours to fully charge. Providing 4-16 hours running time depending on the usage settings. Is the neck fan adjustable? Yes, please twist the bladeless neck fan right and left to adjust the suitable angle to fit your neck. What is the charging method for the portable neck fan ? KIDEE neck fan rechargeable utilizes a convenient USB charging method (5V/1A Type C), providing flexibility and ease of charging through various USB-compatible devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Florida Summer Essential - Keeps You Cool Against the Heat!
reviews.reviewText: As a Florida resident, I am no stranger to the sweltering summer heat and the near-unbearable humidity that comes with it. While I tend to stay indoors to escape the sun's relentless rays, there are times when I must venture out. On those occasions, the KIDEE neck fan has become my go-to gadget for staying cool and comfortable.Despite being a bit on the noisy side, which is noticeable but not a dealbreaker, and feeling somewhat uncomfortable against my skin after prolonged use, I've found the benefits far outweigh these minor inconveniences. A cushioned material would be a welcome upgrade for future models, and I can't help but dream about the bliss of a misting feature to further alleviate the heat. Nevertheless, the KIDEE neck fan delivers admirably on its promise to keep you cool.The fan's long battery life ensures that I can rely on it throughout my outdoor adventures without constant recharging. The material, albeit hard, is flexible enough to adjust for a better fit around my neck. The powerful fan offers a refreshing breeze that is much needed in the Florida climate, and the quality construction gives me confidence that this device will be a lasting companion.For anyone planning a trip to Disney World or preparing to spend any time outdoors in Florida, I highly recommend the KIDEE neck fan. It's a simple solution to a complex problem - beating the heat. It has quickly become an indispensable part of my summer survival kit, and I'm sure it will be just as valuable to others living in or visiting hot climates.In summary, the KIDEE neck fan is a solid investment for those seeking relief from the heat. It's a functional, well-constructed device that does exactly what it's made to do - keep you cool and make the Florida heat a little more bearable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lifesaver at the Citi Open!
reviews.reviewText: The KIDEE Neck Fan proved to be an absolute game-changer during my recent visit to the Citi Open in scorching hot weather.Cooling Power (5/5): The upgraded 360° airflow is a game-changer. It kept me cool and comfortable throughout the entire event, even when the sun was at its peak.Whisper-Quiet (5/5): I was pleasantly surprised by how quiet this fan is. It didn't distract me from the game or conversations with fellow attendees.Adjustable Speeds (5/5): The three-speed options came in handy. I could tailor the airflow to match my comfort level, whether I needed a gentle breeze or a stronger cooling effect.Portability (5/5): The portability of this fan is a massive plus. It's lightweight, comfortable to wear, and the hands-free design allowed me to enjoy the tennis matches without any hassle.Battery Life (5/5): The battery life exceeded my expectations. It lasted the entire day without needing a recharge, which was a lifesaver.Overall, the KIDEE Neck Fan is a must-have for anyone attending outdoor events in hot weather. It kept me cool, comfortable, and enjoying every moment of the Citi Open. I couldn't have asked for a better companion in the scorching sun. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked well in Cancun
reviews.reviewText: I took this on a week long trip to Cancun, after seeing my friend with one. It worked well in the hot weather. It didn't last all day but I think the anticipation was to use it for 8 hours. I'm sure I tried to get more use out of it. But it worked great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave this as a gift because I had one. This is a life changing product! It works well, and quickly to cool a hotflash. The only negative is that u hear the fan running and can interfer with hearing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot flash Solution
reviews.reviewText: This is great for dealing with hot flashes. I didn't think it would help but it makes a huge difference. I use it while I'm cooking and keep it nearby for quick relief. I like that you can just charge it and doesn't need batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its pretty nice. I work in fast food and it gets super hot beside the grill or behind the fried so I got this to keep me cool behind those stations. This is great for the "cooler" spots that are still a little warm, but it simply just shuts off in hotter conditions.Its light and pretty comfortable, doesn't get in the way which is nice. As far as noise goes, it could definitely be quieter, it's not loud per say but its definitely not quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot, and have hot flashes. I love that this is rechargeable. I had the neck fan off and on (but mostly on and on high) for over 12 hours during a long travel day, and it never ran out of power. The only recommendation I would have is for the manufacturer to add a lock switch, so if you want to put it in your bag you don't have to worry about hitting the power button and running the battery down without realizing it. This thing is quiet. Big plus I have long layered curly hair which did get in the fan a couple times but it just made funny noise, and did not eat my hair or get tangled in the neck fan.

reviews.reviewTitle: The gadget you thought you didn't need.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this on a whim. I love gadgets. This is really a great thing. Wore it while sitting outside in the sun and it was very effective. Brought it on a family trip to an amusement park and shared it almost all day. We must have used if for 3 or 4 hours and it was still working. Takes time to fully charge though. If you have along day ahead just charge it overnight. Great battery life.Looks great, everyone thinks it is a headset. Love the 360 fans, it is not as flexible as the others because of this but I appreciate the breeze on the back of my neck where usually we sweat most. It is not too heavy, you feel it at first but then forget it is there. Once you take it off or turn it off you really notice a difference, it cools you down. I like that it is white because it won't absorb heat and get hot. Other colors like black will only get warm under the sun so white is the way to go. Looks stylish so you don't look odd wearing it. Perfect if you have hot flashes or fell flush.I never thought it would be as useful as it is. Who knew? I like it a lot!

ce type de model est bien pour les cheveux long, mais pour les cheveux court le modele avec 2 simples elices est plus efficace, plus de cent, beaucoup plus silencieux et oriantable egalement partout haut , bas , meme deriere le coup... bref si vous n avez pas de cheveux long le modele simple avec 2 petites elice est 10x mieux.... !
Lasts for such a long time and is such a good way to cool down. I work in aged care and in a kitchen sometimes and it’s such a life saver

I'm obsessed. I'm beyond happy with this purchase. This is my third. I accidently dropped one onto cement. One side still worked. I use a fan every day of the year at work. I have purchased many different fan over the last few years. I sadly drop a lot of them. This fan is perfect for me in every way. Its purple (so it matches my hair), it is perfect size ( it doesn't slide around), The battery lasts for a full shift 7.5 hours. I find it perfect for my white noise. I sure hope I don't drop these two I have. Thank you for in my opinion for this amazing fan!
It was, as advertised. I found it a little too noisy when it's on the highest setting.
